ValidationRule.description: If 'Flat/Fixed amount frequency' = 'One Time' or 'Include with every invoice', then the Start Date and End Date should be required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Contract', IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(ia_crm__Contract_Line_Save_Cancel_He__c, 'One-time'), ISPICKVAL(ia_crm__Contract_Line_Save_Cancel_He__c, 'Include with every invoice')),IF(OR(ISBLANK( ia_crm__Start_Date__c ),ISBLANK( ia_crm__End_Date__c )), true, false), false), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If 'Flat/Fixed amount frequency' = 'One Time' or 'Include with every invoice' the Start Date and End Date are required.
